TopicTitle: My KSP 1.0 has no parts, nor flags. Please Help!

Articles.Content:
Hey, I just got KSP 1.0 and I have a lot of mods and stuff on .9, and my KSP didn't update correctly.

Thanks!

Hi mariomario190, can you try reinstalling it if you bought it from anywhere but Steam, and verify the file cache if you bought it on Steam, thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Wheres the file cache?

Oh, and, it is from Steam. 

Oh, and this should be moved to unmodded. My mistake!

You need to right click KSP in the Steam client.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/jpRba)
Oh, all right, I will do that as soon as I get the chance.

It said 497 files were unvalidated and it was working to replace them. It finished and as of now I am opening KSP back up.

- - - Updated - - -

IT WORKS!!!! Thank you so much!
